price: ߊߟߊ߫ ߢߊ߬ߣߍ߲߫ ߒ߬ ߡߊ߬ ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߘߐ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߒ߬ ߕߊ߲߬ߞߊ߬ ߝߢߐ߫ ߞߟߊߡߊ߲ ߖߊ߲߰ߞߕߊ ߡߊ߬
arabic: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: famanna al-lahu ʿalaynā wawaqānā ʿadhāba al-samūmi
